description:
Each of these handcrafted hats is unique, like the kids who wear them and the people who make them. They are knit in Nepal by a group of women learning a skilled trade for access to safe and sustainable employment and a livelihood that empowers.

  • Made of wool with felted animal apliques and contrast stitching at hem
  • Headband is soft polyester fleece
  • Pompom is big and soft
name: Ambler Canuck Earflap Hat - Children
